H0.text: An iron nail is attracted by a magnet.

H1.text: An ice cube is attracted by a magnet, as some objects are attracted by magnets.

H2.text: A plastic knife is an object that is attracted by a magnet.

H3.text: A wooden ruler is an object that is attracted by a magnet.

A4.text: Below its Curie point of 770 °C (1,420 °F; 1,040 K), α-iron changes from paramagnetic to ferromagnetic.
